title: Medieval society: the villagers
brief_description: Depicts a typical village of 1128 A.D. in England. Various villagers such as a bailiff, serf, reeve, miller, carpenter, swineherd, priest, shepherd and potter briefly explain their lives. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
